/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/:
The image captures a bustling city street bathed in the warm glow of a setting sun. The sun's rays filter through the clear blue sky, casting long shadows and illuminating the scene with a soft, golden light. 

On either side of the street, modern buildings rise, their facades adorned with glass windows that reflect the sunlight. The buildings are predominantly white and gray, punctuated by occasional splashes of blue and green, adding a touch of color to the urban landscape.

The street itself is a hive of activity. Several cars, painted in shades of white, black, and red, are scattered across the road. A few pedestrians can be seen strolling along the sidewalk, adding a human element to the scene.

Streetlights stand sentinel along the sidewalk, ready to bathe the street in their light as dusk falls. Traffic signs punctuate the scene, guiding the flow of vehicles and ensuring order amidst the hustle and bustle.

The image is taken from a high vantage point, offering a bird's eye view of the street below. This perspective allows for a comprehensive view of the cityscape, capturing the essence of urban life in a single frame.
